creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: white swans swimming on blue water with brown wall at left and short brown wall at right; green vertical lines of foliage at top; suggestions of rooftops in ULQ; some embossing; lightly abstracted image; shin hanga (fūkei-ga)
marks: at bottom LLC, in pencil: [Bruges]; at bottom LRC,
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Bruges
